titles.title: I BELIEVE IN YOU
We give You all the glory

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I just want to lift
my hands to You, Lord
You are a wonderful God
Miraculous King
Fill this place with all
Your Holy Presence
and pour Your power on us
as we seek more of You

verse.name: p1
c1
verse.lines:
We give You
all, all the glory
We give You
all, all the honor
Amazing Son of God.
